title: HMSI recalls GL1800 Gold Wing, CBR1000RR units to fix faulty fuel pumps
description: ."The fuel pump impellers may have been improperly molded, which can cause them to deform and result in fuel pump failure. If the fuel pump module becomes inoperative, the engine may not start or can stall without indication while riding," the company stated.
